full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DBANG DRAG DREG PA'I GTZO BO DMAR, ,GTUM DRAG BEKTZE'I CHOS SKOR LAS, ,DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED THUN ZOR CHOG ,'JIGS MED GO CHA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI SGO NAS DRAG PO THUN ZOR GYI CHO GA 'JIGS MED GO CHA BYA BA 'DI NI T'A NA WARTAS, CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA RGYUD LAS 'BYUNG BA'I STENG DU CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG STE BRIS SO, ,)
